// modmenu: Translatable Descriptions and Summaries in Mod Menu
modmenu.summaryTranslation.silk-api: Fabric API extensions for making fancy functionality.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.silk-api: Advanced Fabric API extensions for adding fancy mod items, blocks, mobs and features. The goal is to make it easy for fabric mod developers to produce a variety of advanced operations.
text.silk-api.confirm_update: In order to protect the interests of mod authors, they will jump to the mod website before automatic download to ensure that the authors get the advertising revenue they deserve.
text.silk-api.downloaded: %s has been installed in the mods folder. Please delete the old version quickly.
text.silk-api.updated: %s has been installed in the mods folder. Please close the game to clean the files.
